title: Drawing, "Sideboard", October 17, 1933
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower left: DONALD DESKEY/145 WEST 57TH STREET/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower left: V. & S./10/17/33; lower center: SOLID SIDES TOPS STRAIGHT GRAIN MAHOGANY/FRONTS SWIRL MAHOG./ MAHOG. INTERIORS; lower right: SCALE 1"-1'0"/7600 [circled]; inscribed in red color pencil at lower right: P; dimensions in graphite
description: Perspective, plan, and elevation drawing for long horizontal mahogany sideboard. Two large drawers with rounded surfaces on left and right sides; circular pulls at center of drawers. Two narrow rectangular drawers at center with long horizontal pulls. Six straight, squared, and tapered legs support sideboard.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sideboard", October 17, 1933.
October 17, 1933. Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-921.
